definition: an attitude of admiration or esteem, look on as or consider
details:
noun
- an attitude of admiration or esteem
= synonyms: regard
- a feeling of delighted approval and liking
= synonyms: admiration
- the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded)
= example: the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded)
= synonyms: regard
verb
- look on as or consider
= synonyms: repute, think of, regard as, look upon, look on, take to be
- regard highly
= synonyms: respect
